Test Name: Myeloma Stratification and Risk-Adapted Therapy with Reflex to Minimal Residual Disease, Bone Marrow
Purpose: To stratify myeloma, guide risk-adapted therapy, and detect minimal residual disease (MRD).
Container: EDTA anticoagulant tube (or other accepted anticoagulant tube)
Equipment: Flow cytometer, PCR equipment, next-generation sequencing (NGS) platform
